titleStmt.title: The Queenes Arcadia A pastorall trage-comedie presented to her Maiestie and her ladies, by the Vniuersitie of Oxford in Christs Church, in August last. 1605.
titleStmt.author: Daniel, Samuel, 1562-1619.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld, for Simon Waterson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
